blog.title: Democracy beyond the nation-state - What is there ?
blog.description: When climate, water, and digital challenges cross borders but democracy doesn't, what's the alternative? This narrative essay compares confederation, federation, and cosmopolitan democracy through three fictional characters on a Barcelona-Tunis ferry.

prevBlog.title: Making My Site Discoverable - SEO, Webmentions, and a Traffic Spike
prevBlog.description: I overhauled my site's SEO with Schema.org markup and replaced Giscus comments with Webmentions. The timing coincided with a surprising 200% traffic increase. Here's what I learned about making content discoverable.
